title: Microsoft visual C++ download problem
body:
I'm having a problem on downloading league of legends because of Microsoft Visual C++ download problem. It says syntax error all the time. However, when I download league of legend from Korea Server and change a file to change a region, it works. BUT I AM SICK OF IT. I really don't want to download like this anymore, and even though I try to download league of legend by NA server, it keeps causing a syntax error. I've updated windows till the last update, and I don't know what's the problem is. Can you help me riot? Thank you.

P.S. because it was downloaded unstably, it bug splat me, and let me redownload the game while I'm in my ranked game. I really need support about this. Thank you.

replies.body:
Have you tried installing the Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable file [**directly from Microsoft**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)? It may end up resolving this issue, so I definitely recommend giving it a try.

Let me know if you continue to experience this error.
yes I've tried to download directly from Microsoft, however it didn't work. I am really confused why doesn't it work.

Yeah, that's pretty weird! Usually, running windows updates and that standalone installer resolve the issue. I'd like you to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some logs created with our [**HRT**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) so our techs can further assist with troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you run into any issues.
